\documentclass[pdftex,10pt,b5paper,twoside, openright]{book}
\input{tex/preamble}
\input{tex/glossary}
\input{tex/nomenclature}

\begin{document}
	%% Start dummy-titlepage
	% Titlepage generated by DAIM
	% \begin{titlingpage}
	% \hypersetup{pageanchor=false}
	% Dummy front-page \clearpage
	% \hypersetup{pageanchor=true}
	% \cleardoublepage{}
	% \end{titlingpage}
	%% End dummy-titlepage
	
	% \input{tex/dedication}		%% Optional
	% \clearpage

	\pagenumbering{roman}
	\setcounter{page}{1}

	\input{tex/problem_description}
	\cleardoublepage{}

	\input{tex/preface}
	\cleardoublepage{}
	
	\input{tex/abstract}
	\cleardoublepage{}
	
	\input{tex/sammendrag} %Abstract in norwegian
	
	\tableofcontents{}
	\clearpage{}
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{List of Figures}
	\listoffigures \clearpage
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{List of Tables}
	\listoftables \clearpage
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Glossary}
	\printglossary{}
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Acronyms}		
	\printglossary[type=\acronymtype,nopostdot]

	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Nomenclature}
	\printnomenclature[2.5 cm]
	\clearpage{}

	\glsresetall{}
	\pagenumbering{arabic}	
	\input{tex/chapter-introduction} \clearpage 
	\input{tex/chapter-theoretical_background} \clearpage 
	\input{tex/chapter-preprocessing} \clearpage
	\input{tex/chapter-MHT-module} \clearpage 
	\input{tex/chapter-results} \clearpage 
	\input{tex/chapter-discussion} \clearpage  
	\input{tex/chapter-future-work} \clearpage  
	\input{tex/chapter-conclusion} \clearpage  
	\makeatletter\@openrightfalse\makeatother
	\input{tex/chapter-appendices} \clearpage

	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Bibliography}
	\printbibliography{}
	% \listoftodos{}
\end{document}
